meanings.sent1: Every lustrum, we celebrate our achievements over the past five years.
meanings.sent2: The company plans its goals for the next lustrum.
meanings.sent3: During the lustrum, we all get together for a big party.
meanings.sent4: The lustrum felt like a journey through time, marking our progress.
meanings.sent5: The lustrum passed by quickly, filled with memories and growth.

meanings.definition: A ceremonial purification of the Roman people performed every five years.
meanings.sent1: The lustrum ceremony was a solemn event in ancient Rome.
meanings.sent2: The priests conducted the lustrum to cleanse the community.
meanings.sent3: The lustrum ritual involved special herbs and prayers.
meanings.sent4: Participating in the lustrum made everyone feel spiritually renewed.
meanings.sent5: The lustrum tradition was a time of spiritual reflection and unity.
